k = int(input())
s = str(input())
print(s[:k] + '...' if len(s) > k else s)

s = str(input())

k = input()
s = input()
if k > len(s):
    print(s)
else:
    print(s[:k] + '...')

with open('input.txt') as f:
    k, s = f.readline(), f.readline()
    if int(k) > len(s):
        print(s)
    else:
        print(s[:int(k)] + '...')
